metadata.title: CVE-2023-4057 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 115, Firefox ESR 115.0, andThunderbird 115.0. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 116,Firefox ESR < 115.1, and Thunderbird < 115.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
